Description: This corpus contains articles from the Arabic newspaper An-Nahar from 1995 to 2000.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the ELRA catalogue.

Corpus: SYN2013PUB: corpus of written Czech newspapers

Corpus: Corpus journalistique issu de l'Est Républicain
Description: This corpus contains articles from the French newspaper l'Est Républicain from 1999 to 2003.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from Ortolang.

Corpus: Tübingen Treebank of Written German / Newspaper Corpus
Annotation: tokenised, MSD tagged, lemmatised, syntactic constituency, named-entities
Description: This corpus contains articles from the German newspaper Die Tageszeitung.#SEPThe corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer with an institutional account.

Corpus: MTP Annotated German corpus - tagged version
Description: This corpus contains articles from two German newspapers Die Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung and Die Zeit from 1992.#SEPThe corpus can be downloaded from the ELRA catalogue.

Corpus: Mannheim Corpus of Historical Newspapers and Magazines
Description: This corpus contains articles from 21 German newspapers from the 18th and 19th century.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARIN-D repository.
The corpus contains newspaper articles.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARIN:EL repository.

Corpus: The image of Germany in the Greek press
Description: The corpus consists of newspaper articles from three Greek newspapers (Ta Nea, Risospastis, and To Vima) dealing with Germany from the Greek perspective.#SEPBibliographical information is encoded in the path to the file: It is composed of title of the newspaper, year, month, day, and rubric. The lemmata are stored in a separate tree of the same structure, the text files in that tree contain one lemma per line. #SEPThe corpus is available for download from CLARIN-D (Saarland University B-centre).
This corpus contains newspaper articles in various topics (politics, economy, sports).#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARIN:EL repository.

Corpus: Modern Greek Texts Corpus - "Ta Nea" newspaper
Description: This corpus contains newspaper articles in various topics (politics, economy, sports).#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARIN:EL repository.

This corpus contains texts collected from four different domains:#SEP
  • newspapers: 2,179,800 words from La Stampa, La Repubblica, Il Corriere della Sera, L’Unione Sarda, Il Sole 24ore, between 1992 and 1996
  • periodicals: 143,810 words from Casaviva, 100cose, Epoca, Espansione, Grazia, Panorama, Starbene, Storia Illustrata, Zerouno, between 1985 and 1988
  • books: 564,964 words, between 1970 and 1989,
  • miscellaneous: 247,077 words from CNR documents, Patents, Maritime documents, Theater, between 1987 and 1997.
